IN NO EVENT SHALL * THE COPYRIGHT OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE * FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, * EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES * (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF * SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, * OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER * CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER * IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT * (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN * ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF * ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE * * This file creating date: Feb 19, 2003 / 8:56:28 PM * The JForum Project * http://www.jforum.net */ package net.jforum.dao; import java.util.List; import net.jforum.entities.Group; /** * Model interface for {@link net.jforum.entities.Group}. * This interface defines methods which are expected to be * implementd by a specific data access driver. The intention is * to provide all functionality needed to update, insert, delete and * select some specific data. * * @author Rafael Steil * @version $Id: GroupDAO.java,v 1.6 2006/08/23 02:13:34 rafaelsteil Exp $ */ public interface GroupDAO { /** * Gets a specific Group. * * @param groupId The Group ID to search * @return Groupobject containing all the information * @see #selectAll */ public Group selectById(int groupId) ; /** * Get all groups * * @return ArrayList containing the groups. Each entry * is an Group object. */ public List selectAll() ; /** * Checks if is possible to delete a specific group. * * @param groupId The group ID to verify * @return true if is possible to delete, false if not * @see #delete(int) */ public boolean canDelete(int groupId) ; /** * Deletes a group. * * @param groupId The group ID to delete * @see #canDelete(int) */ public void delete(int groupId) ; /** * Updates a group. * * @param group Reference to a Group object to update */ public void update(Group group) ; /** * Adds a new group. * * @param group Reference to a valid and configured Group object */ public void addNew(Group group) ; /** * Select the users associated to some group; * * @return ArrayList with the user ids * @param groupId int */ public List selectUsersIds(int groupId) ; }
